title: O'Reilly - Native Web Apps for Android
description:
Create native web applications for Android devices, using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and related technologies. With this video course, mobile and web developer Max Firtman shows you how to build apps for Android smartphones and tablets that you can distribute through the Google Play store and other marketplaces.
Learn how to use Android Studio, emulators, and other free tools to combine Java-based Android development with standard web technologies. By using HTML5 as the main platform, youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll be able to design and develop your apps without having to learn much Java code
